description:
Jet of Time is an open world randomizer for the iconic JRPG Chrono Trigger.

Players start with two characters and the winged Epoch and must journey through time finding
additional characters and key items to save the world from the evil Lavos.

v0.0.2.description:
Updates the Chrono Trigger: Jets of Time apworld to the new AP options API.

Fixes several bugs:

- Pyramid generation bug
- 16 character name bug

Moves player data into the first 4MB of the ROM so that RetroArch can read it.

Instead of specifying only the 15ish locations in the yaml that were chosen for key items by the randomizer, list all available locations by region, along with region access rules.  This will allow AP to utilize the full set of locations for progression when running with Chronosanity.  Non-chronosanity seeds will still be limited to about 15 locations, depending on game mode.
v0.0.2.title: v0.0.2

v0.0.3.description:
Bug fix release

Fixed a bug in settings code that caused an error in the exit handler after generation.
Fixed a bug in Ice Age mode where Mt. Woe chests would result in double treasure.
v0.0.3.title: V0.0.3

v0.0.4.description:
Fixes a bug in Ice Age location selection that could lead to an unobtainable item in Magic Cave.

Adds the Archipelago.json manifest file.
v0.0.4.title: Ice Age Location Bug Fix
